'''Radiant Spincrystal 56''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Murmuring Creek]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a rock next to the stairs in [[Chinju Forest]].
